binance 0.0.4

    Search P2P

    p2p_search.Rd

    Search P2P

    p2p_search(coin, fiat, side, pay_types = c(), page = NA, rows = 10)

    Arguments

    coin

    Coin.

    fiat

    Fiat currency.

    side

    Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".

    pay_types

    Options for payment. One or more of "BANK", "WECHAT" or "ALIPAY". The default, c(), allows all payment options.

    page

    Page number. If NA then get all pages.

    rows

    Number of records per page.

    Value

    A data frame.

    Examples

    # Grab the first page.
p2p_search("ETH", "USD", side = "BUY", page = 1)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 113219887… BUY   ETH   USD   2735.   3.93            15    7500    <tibble>  
#>  2 113217753… BUY   ETH   USD   2800    0.0498          40     140.   <tibble>  
#>  3 113225990… BUY   ETH   USD   2855    0.323          150     923.   <tibble>  
#>  4 113172818… BUY   ETH   USD   2879.   0.385           10     150    <tibble>  
#>  5 113003506… BUY   ETH   USD   2880.   0.472           10    1361.   <tibble>  
#>  6 113215364… BUY   ETH   USD   2917.   0.0299           5      87.2  <tibble>  
#>  7 113208895… BUY   ETH   USD   3029.   0.0475           5     144.   <tibble>  
#>  8 112183219… BUY   ETH   USD   3058.   1.27           200    3000    <tibble>  
#>  9 113092842… BUY   ETH   USD   3069.   0.00249          5       7.64 <tibble>  
#> 10 113069849… BUY   ETH   USD   3070.   0.0557           5     171.   <tibble>  
#> # … with 1 more variable: payment <list>
# Grab all pages.
p2p_search("BUSD", "CAD", side = "BUY")
#> # A tibble: 22 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 113226526… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     5878.       1000      7582. <tibble>  
#>  2 113222507… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     1359.        350      1500  <tibble>  
#>  3 113227185… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     1985.        500      2561. <tibble>  
#>  4 113136133… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29      163.        163       164  <tibble>  
#>  5 112784465… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3       559.        559       727. <tibble>  
#>  6 113178162… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3       774.        200      1000  <tibble>  
#>  7 113225796… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3      1614.        300      2000  <tibble>  
#>  8 113220538… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3      1793.        200      1500  <tibble>  
#>  9 113181511… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3      1220.        300      1586. <tibble>  
#> 10 113181508… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.3       649.        300       844. <tibble>  
#> # … with 12 more rows, and 1 more variable: payment <list>
